name: Graphiti Memory
description: Temporal knowledge graph memory for OpenClaw with adaptive importance scoring (Memory Cortex)
author: Basuru

groupId.description: Memory group ID for all conversations

autoRecall.description: Automatically recall relevant memories before each response

recallMaxFacts.description: Maximum facts to recall per query

minPromptLength.description: Minimum prompt length to trigger recall

scoringExplicitThreshold.description: Score >= this triggers explicit storage (user notification)

scoringSilentDays.description: Days before silent memories need reinforcement

scoringCleanupHours.description: How often to run cleanup via heartbeat (hours)

scoringNotifyExplicit.description: Notify user when storing explicit importance memories

scoringAskBeforeDowngrade.description: Ask user before downgrading memory importance
